ProtoDeclare.appinfo: Camera node provides direct control of scene view to enable cinematic camera animation shot by shot and move by move along with still digital-photography settings for offline rendering of camera images.
ProtoDeclare.name: Camera

field.appinfo: Text description to be displayed for this Camera
field.name: description

field.appinfo: Camera position in local transformation frame, which is default prior to first CameraShot initialPosition getting activated
field.name: position

field.appinfo: Camera rotation in local transformation frame, which is default prior to first CameraShot initialPosition getting activated
field.name: orientation

field.appinfo: input fraction drives interpolators
field.name: set_fraction

field.appinfo: input event binds or unbinds this Camera
field.name: set_bind

field.appinfo: output event indicates when this Camera is bound
field.name: bindTime

field.appinfo: output event indicates whether this Camera is bound or unbound
field.name: isBound

field.appinfo: Vector distance to near clipping plane corresponds to NavigationInfo.avatarSize[0]
field.name: nearClipPlane

field.appinfo: Vector distance to far clipping plane corresponds to NavigationInfo.visibilityLimit
field.name: farClipPlane

field.appinfo: Array of CameraShot nodes which in turn contain CameraMovement nodes
field.name: shots

field.appinfo: Whether camera headlight is on or off
field.name: headlight

field.appinfo: Camera headlight color
field.name: headlightColor

field.appinfo: Camera headlight intensity
field.name: headlightIntensity

field.appinfo: Camera filter color that modifies virtual lens capture
field.name: filterColor

field.appinfo: Camera filter transparency that modifies virtual lens capture
field.name: filterTransparency

field.appinfo: upVector changes modify camera orientation (and possibly vice versa)
field.name: upVector

field.appinfo: Focal length divided effective aperture diameter indicating width of focal plane
field.name: fStop

field.appinfo: Distance to focal plane of sharpest focus
field.name: focusDistance

field.appinfo: Mark start/stop with true/false output respectively useful to trigger external animations
field.name: isActive

field.appinfo: Total duration of contained enabled CameraShot (and thus CameraMovement) move durations
field.name: totalDuration

field.appinfo: OfflineRender node
field.name: offlineRender

field.appinfo: enable console output to trace script computations and prototype progress
field.name: traceEnabled
